title: 1 BR Evanston 2118 Central St
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   1BR in vintage building in North Evanston. Hardwood floors, walk in closet. On-site laundry. Cats ok for additional $10 per month. Off street parking space when available for $60 per month. Heat and water included.  Non- refundable $50 application fee per adult, and $250 move-in fee  Photos are representative of apartments in this building but not of any particular unit.   To view this unit please call Valentin 708-243-1140 or text Simona 847-235-0137
